Name: Anmol
Review Text: This place is excellent. Everything we ordered was delicious. My favorites were the meat samosa, the chicken madras and the naan. The naan here is big and fluffy. I have not seen naan like this at other Indian restaurants in the area. Definitely highly recommend.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Exquisite experience.  We got the veggie app platter and each piece was unique and delicious, the naan is consistently delicious.  We also got the paneer tikka masala and the regional pancake , each one amazing . …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I've only ever been to the bar side of the restaurant, but I'm sure the food's the same no matter which side you walk in on. Food? Fantastic!!! Start with an Anmol platter and then finish with the chicken Korma. Atmosphere at the bar is OK. …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: OMG!  The food here is awesome 👌 😋!!! First time here for lunch,  the place looks a little bit outdated but plenty of tables. The  waiter looked properly dressed as a real waiter in uniform, distinct & elegant. Appetizers were very …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I can't say enough good things about this place!! Always friendly staff and such amazing food. I have never had a dish I didn't like! Great place to enjoy delicious Indian food, a good cocktail and pleasant conversation. So happy to see them opening back up for dine in! Can I put more than 5 stars somehow??

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Service wasn't good. We saw our waiter twice in the hour and a half we were there. Not a busy night, either. Just left the cash for our drinks and left. We didn't order food, so I won't review it. Ive had their food before, though, and enjoyed it.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Some of the best Indian food I've had in a while! Excellent service and strong drinks. I'll definitely be back!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Excellent, highly recommend! Everything was very fresh. Fluffy homemade naan bread. Delicious samosas. Great service. Be ready to take food home, big portions and lots of rice that comes with each curry. Super nice cold beer in frozen glasses.

Name: Anmol
Review Text:
I and my wife visited this restaurant while travelling back from Maine. Being from India and positive google reviews made us
to visit. I must say - All Food was flavorful and delicious! We tried Aloo …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Cute place but I've had better food in other restaurant. Small portion of butter chicken and chicken masala but great flavor. Garlic Naan is great and mango lassi.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Delicious Indian cuisine! I wasn’t originally a fan of Indian cooking but this place has made me see the light! I could drink that tikka Marsala sauce and the garlic naan is outrageous. The waitstaff and manager are super nice and helpful too.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: My first time trying Indian cuisine and it was so good! I even paid them another visit the same week! We went during lunch time, and I’m not sure if rice was included with each curry but we ordered 2 Chicken Tikka Masala and only received 1 …

Review Text: Well a lot of review says the tip customer give doesnt go to the employee at the end of the day which is really sad. Makes me think what kind of situation employee must be going through everyday working their shift inside this terribly …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Excellent vegetable samosas as an appetizer. Cauliflower, eggplant, delicious garlic naam, marsala tea for dinner. Nice friendly staff. Really clean restaurant. Will go back again.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Curries didn't seem to have much flavor. I think passage to India does a better job with spices and everything overall.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Delicious food and great service every time!!! Tikka Masala and Garlic Naan bread are a must! 10/10

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I would not get Indian food anywhere else. Anmol is home to the best chicken tikka masala ever. Would highly recommend especially over Passage to India. Everyone who works here is so nice and accommodating.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: The best Indian food I've ever had!! Their flavors, their taste, everything is cooked perfectly and excellent the flavors of the food are immaculate. Restaurant has a nice atmosphere and decor. You feel very comfortable, their lunch special …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Excellent food!! Their tikka masala is amazing, as well as the other many things we ordered that I can't remember! I'll be going back for sure

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I feel so bad right now. Somehow I must of pocket reviewed this place 3 stars 2 years ago. Did not even think that was possible. The food was perfect. Name: Anmol
Review Text: The best Indian food I've had since living in England!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Hands down my favorite place to eat in Beverly, can't get enough! I look forward to some hot tikka masala every time I visit my hometown. Service is friendly and efficient. I've never had to wait for a table, but I'd gladly stand out in the cold for Anmol.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: One of my favorite places in the area for no frills Indian food.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: This restaurant is the favorite of my wife's Indian co-workers. So I wanted to try it. It did not disappoint. Tender meats, flavorful sauces, all perfectly executed. The establishment is split into a spacious bar and two smallish dining …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great service and great food! They also have a Lounge/Bar area that has karaoke some nights

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Probably my favorite restaurant in Beverly. As a white girl IDK if the food is ~authentic Indian~ or not, but it's definitely delicious. I used to order there a lot in college. Whenever I go up to visit my parents in Maine, I order some …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: This food is amazing and consistently good!! I just went to a supposedly super authentic Indian restaurant in NY and I came back and had Anmol and I thought to myself Anmol tastes so much better!! Before COVID I ate in their establishment a …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Delicious Indian food right in downtown Beverly. A couple favorites are their Aloo Tikki Chaat and the Chicken Korma. Haven't had a chance to dine in because of the pandemic, but gotten takeout multiple times and the food is always delicious!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: It's an okayish place to dine in. The service isn't as good as you'd expect.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Vegetarian dishes were good. We got the chicken jalfrezi and the chicken was overcooked. The 5 star is for being the only restaurant close to M by the sea and their veg dishes were good.

Name: Anmol
Review Text:

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I told my friends about this restaurant with my warmest recommendations. I go their often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the cooking is flavorable and the team is efficient and cooperative. always when we eat in this place we enjoy a lovely time.  highly recommended.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I have had Indian food all over the country and this is by far my absolute favorite. Bobby the owner is a stand up guy. Everything just tastes SO RIGHT! Definitely one of my top visited restaurants that I go to. I’ve never been disappointed.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Best Indian food on the Northshore, hands down. Atmosphere is warm and comfy. You'll always see familiar faces, but service can be hit or miss. I reccomend take-out for an always consistent experience!

Review Text:

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great Indian cuisine here.  The staff is very nice and helpful.  The food has a great flavor.  You have the option of asking how spicy you would like your meal to be.  Quick service. Large food portions.  Great ambience.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great place to buy food when in a rush. Their customer service is efficient, prices are affordable, great ambience. Will visit here again

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I go here probably once every two weeks. The food is very fresh. The snap is very friendly and you can tell that there is effort put into each dish. It goes from mild to hunt on spice levels and they asked you before you place an order. Do not be afraid to order here even if you do not like spicy.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Good atmosphere, great curry, fantastic apps, honestly just everything was a good experience!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Good service and flavorful Indian dishes. Get the garlic naan and mango lamb/chicken. Meat has been on the dry side before but it hasn't deterred me from going back to try new entrees. Interesting place. Eat at the bar for a casual or quick …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: This is by far the best Indian restaurant I've ever been to in the country. Absolutely delicious and authentic. The server was so nice and courteous. The place is neat and well organized. Their naan bread - you have to try this. It was made …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: The mango chicken is my favorite thing on the menu here. Also their garlic naan bread is incredible. Great prices and quick take out service.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Delicious authentic Indian food. My wife, coworkers and I LOVE this place! I personally love the Chicken Korma, but there are so many others that are good. The service can be a little slow at lunch, so get there early and enjoy!!!

Name: Anmol
Review Text:
Really delicious. Ordered some of the staples and was not disappointed.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: So delicious and everyone who works there is super nice.  Their dal soup is scrumptious and they have excellent vegetarian options. It has a really cozy atmosphere too. Great for dining in it take out.

Review Text: Best Indian I’ve ever had.

Review Text: Awesome dinner... samosa, naan.....the entire meal was tremendous.  ONLY issue could be the parking, but it is not so horrible as to lose any portion of a star

Review Text: Really Excellent. Everything was first class Indian food.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Several veg curries and pakora for takeout. The spicy dish was properly spicy and medium dish properly medium. Yum.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: The best place to eat authentic Indian food!  I love their entire menu.  The staff are courteous & friendly.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great indian food with some southern indian specials. Only issue I had was dishes being brought out at weird times. Had my appetizer brought out at end of meal and had to remind server twice about Naan. Not issues that make much of a difference as the food was excellent.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Absolutely my favorite Indian restaurant. They take the time to prepare the food so well and it's always a fun time to play Keno, drink a few beers and eat the most delicious Indian food anywhere. Highly recommend the chicken tikka masala, …

Review Text:

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Nice place to hangout with family with delicious Indian food. But one negative is time, they will take 20 minutes to prepare your order some time more than that. You should have lots of patience to be here. Food no doubt this is best in this area. thanks

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Have to say, pretty surprised at the quality of indian food. Great food, had a variety of pakora, and the food was actually spicy. Almost as good as punjabi dhaba in boston, and has the advantage of parking, seating, and they take credit card. Service and food were fast too. Ill have to come back :)

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Simply the best Indian food that I have had on the North Shore. The service is great and the prices are spot on. They have a wonderful bar that becomes pretty busy on the weekend evenings with karaoke. Trying the mango ice cream is a must!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: They provide quick pick up service. Their spices taste very fresh. The #1 Indian restaurant for me in Beverly. Their interior needs a little updating. Staff is very kind.

Name: Anmol

Name: Anmol
Review Text: This is my favorite Indian food in the area (albeit there are not many options;). These guys do a great job providing authentic Indian cuisine for the North Shore. Name: Anmol
Review Text: Amazing place.. Everything was just perfect. Especially the garlic naan- it was the best I have ever tasted, kind of like khameeri roti. Paneer korma gravy wqs superb. I was little disappointed by the tea but overall it was great.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Best Indian food in the area. Only had the take out but its consistently awesome. If you like Indian check this place out. Very good.

Review Text: Simply amazing everytime I go. Best Indian food in the area by a long shot.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Anmol is the best Indian food on the North Shore, and perhaps even better than what you can find in Boston. The wait staff are all extremely kind, quick, and the food will blow your taste buds' minds! Garlic naan and any of the Tikka Masalas are a great combo.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Anmol has the freshest ingredients and traditional Indian food. The service is great and friendly. Highly recommended. It is also very reasonable and a nice quiet atmosphere.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great food, super nice and friendly, they made sure I was taken care of even though they were super busy and I was just grabbing a to go order. When the wait lasted more than 5 min they apologized and offered me a seat at the bar, I didn't mind the wait at all- they were slammed and the food was worth it!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Very poor experience. We called and booked a table yet we had to wait. Was then made to wait for 15mins to place our order with poor customer service. Clearly the saff aren't trained at all. Then we had to wait for another 36mins for our …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Excellent Indian food, they do standards like Tikka Masala and Vindaloo very well. Service can be painfully slow, especially when they get busy, but it's worth enduring it for great food.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: We have been at Anmol many time. We feel at advantage that Anmol is in Beverly and we donot have to go mikes away for a Indian Restaurant. Food is consistenly same and good. Many of our American friends have been with us and repeatdly gone on their own. Best Food.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Food was mediocre, quantity of food was way too little.  The owner and cook is from Nepal, no wonder the food didn’t taste like Indian food at all, it’s totally not worth it.  Most of the reviews here are probably by the restaurant staff.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: The food and service were beyond my expectations. We absolutely loved the atmosphere of this spot. Great spot to take my family out for dinner.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Food is made to order depending on how spicy you like it.  I love their chicken tikka masala and mango lassis.  My husband loves the spicier chicken dishes.  Vegetable byriani is also very good.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Excellent food! Tried a new bread everytime and each of them are great. Try the Gulab Jamun desert as well

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Literally the best food you'll ever eat. No lie. My fiance and I would eat it everyday if we could. In fact we want them to cater our wedding. That's how good they are.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: best indian food on the north shore. excellent vegetarian variety. lush braised meats. my S.O. eats the lamb jalfrezi like once a week. i'm a bit worried. try the bhel, it's a sweet, tangy, salad of puffed rice, onion, and tomato tossed in …

Name: Anmol
Review Text: If you love Indian food this is the best I've had locally! Out of the way but definitely worth it!!

Review Text: Had the Dal Soup and the Lamb Saag and both were amazing. I am thrilled I live down the street because I will be back!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Didn't like the naan but other than that everything was excellent and tasty and so good. I'm very picky where naan is concerned so don't just rely on me for that. However the chicken tikka masala I had was out of this world!!!

Review Text: Close to 30 minutes in the restaurant, and the attitude of the restaurant staff is so sick and arrogant. Looks like the staff don't like desis at all. It just feels sick that we come here with hope just to be insulted. Horrible experience. Will never come again!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Best Indian food in the Boston area.

Review Text: I've dined at many Indian restaurants across the US; Anmol is my favorite by far. The chicken makhni is amazing as is the samosa chaat!

Review Text: Really good Indian food. I like the fact that you can get mild medium or spicy on any dish.

Review Text: Favorite Indian restaurant ever. Great service with friendly staff and bartenders. The food is always well-cooked. I especially like the naan, chicken jalfrazi and chicken tika masala.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Great food, clean kitchen, price is reasonable, owner is a good man. What more need to be said. Tika Massala is the best in New England!!!

Name: Anmol
Review Text: The food was actually quite good, the service friendly and timely, but the decor and atmosphere was terrible. I felt like I was in some strange time portal to a dingy pub in the 90s (which I actually think used to be in that space). Will definitely do take out from there, though.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: Absolutely my favorite restaurant, period! Best food, amazingly friendly staff, quiet, seriously; the best food. Go at all given chances! Haha

Name: Anmol
Review Text: My wife and I love eating at Anmol the food is delicious we don't go to Beverly to much but when we find ourselves in Beverly we make it a point to grab a bite to eat at Anmol.

Name: Anmol
Review Text: I always order to go so I can't speak to service but the food is really good.  I tend to order chicken saag.  Very quick though.

Review Text: My go to Indian place! Customer service is amazing and best spicy butter chicken.

Review Text: This is hands down the best Indian food around. If you want it tasty and spicy, look no further.

Name: Anmol

Review Text: They recently renovated the inside, looks great. Food is fantastic. Highly recommend the mango lassi!

Name: Anmol

Name: Anmol
